meanings.definition: A North African dish of meat and vegetables cooked in a conical pot.
meanings.sent1: My mom made delicious tajines for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: In Morocco, tajines are a popular traditional meal.
meanings.sent3: The tajines at the restaurant were so tasty, they disappeared in minutes!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the simmering tajines filled the kitchen with warmth and flavor.
meanings.sent5: The colorful tajines bubbling on the stove looked like edible rainbows.

meanings.definition: A type of pot used to cook tajines.
meanings.sent1: The chef used a special tajines to prepare the meal.
meanings.sent2: The tajines was made of clay and had a unique shape.
meanings.sent3: When the tajines fell off the shelf, it cracked into pieces.
meanings.sent4: The tajines, with its pointed lid, resembled a tiny wizard's hat.
meanings.sent5: The steam escaped from the tajines as the food cooked inside.

meanings.sent1: At the market, they were selling beautiful tajines.
meanings.sent2: The tajines on the table looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent3: When I asked for two tajines, the seller smiled and nodded.
meanings.sent4: The array of tajines on display dazzled the customers.
meanings.sent5: The sound of clinking tajines filled the air as people shopped around.
